mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_CTGY, NOTICE_STATE, NOTICE_THUMBNAIL_FILE, NOTICE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-dd') "NOTICE_CREATE_DATE" FROM TB_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_STATE DESC, NOTICE_NO

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_CTGY, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-dd') "NOTICE_CREATE_DATE", NOTICE_FILE, NOTICE_COUNT, NOTICE_STATE FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO=#{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_CTGY, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_THUMBNAIL_FILE, NOTICE_FILE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{noticeCtgy}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeThumbnailFile}, #{noticeFile} )
